comments.body:
Once the grace period ends is the session window still retained? From reading the above that seem s to be the case to me. If not we may want to add that the grace period ending also marks the expiration of the session window.

EDIT: Ah I think you can disregard my previous comment.  After reading the Javadoc for `SessionWindows.grace` the grace period is strictly for how long to consider late arriving records and the retention time is now handled by `Materialized.withRetention` correct?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +39,43 @@ * Please see {@link SessionWindows} for more details. *

* New events are added to {@link SessionWindows} until their grace period ends (see {@link SessionWindows#grace(Duration)}). * * Furthermore, updates are sent downstream into a windowed {@link KTable} changelog stream, where
